scripts.say: You saw through my trick, huh... What do you think you, a lone light cruiser, can do to a battleship like me?
I am prepared to fight tooth and nail for Her Majesty's and the Royal Family's glory and reputation.
All guns, train sights on the enemy! Prepare to fire!
I was wrong to call you pompous. If you're going all out, then I too will treat you with respect and fight you with all my strength.
Come at me! I hope you're prepared to be chewed into pieces!
